backend/main.mo: Defines backend data models and DTO modules for users, registration, audit logs, services, and internal code types.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing frontend changes, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme tokens and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads the React app and sets favicon and root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry that configures TanStack Router routes, QueryClient, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen showing an access denied message with a button redirecting to internal login.
frontend/src/components/AccessGate.tsx: Component that verifies user role and status via backend before rendering protected content or denying access.
frontend/src/components/audit/AuditLogTa: Empty placeholder file for an audit log table component.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple brand logo renderer selecting horizontal or icon variant with hardened styling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDel: Gates client features based on active layanan status and disables children when no active service exists.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientLay: Displays the client's layanan list with status badges, dates, and shared principals, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSer: Form for creating service requests plus a list of existing tasks with request type badges and date formatting.
frontend/src/components/CopyRow.tsx: Displays a read‑only input with a button to copy a value to clipboard and shows success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/customer-service: Displays a read-only customer service guide with instructions for checking users, services, tasks, and escalation flows.
Provides a read-only searchable list of services with filtering, details, and availability/status badges.
Shows summary metrics for partners, internal users, services, and tasks along with a dashboard intro card.
Implements task search, filtering, pagination, and status-grouped task cards with a task detail dialog.
Allows creating and storing UI-only escalation tickets with category, summary, priority, and localStorage persistence.
Displays a read-only dialog with user details including client, partner, and internal data sections.
Displays read‑only user and partner management, including search results and partner status sections. Handles selecting users and fetching data via management hooks.
Renders a collapsible list of partners for a given status, handling loading, error, and empty states. Clicking a partner triggers a selection callback.
frontend/src/components/DashboardSidebar: Renders a sidebar with a logo and menu buttons, highlighting the active item.
frontend/src/components/internal/asisten: Provides a Delegation view with subtabs to switch between incoming requests and task delegation creation. Wraps content in a card layout.
Form for loading a task and sending a delegation to a partner, including validation and task assignment/status update calls. Shows loaded task summary and resets fields after submission.
Renders two buttons for switching between Incoming Requests and Create Delegation views.
Loads and displays incoming task requests with expandable details. Handles loading, error, and empty states.
Shows a compact summary of a loaded task, including ID, title, description, type badge, and placeholder deadline.
Displays full task details for a selected task with loading and error handling. Includes a close button and formatted status display.
Displays a task row with expand toggle, status badges, and formatted metadata.
frontend/src/components/internal/MyProfi: Shows and edits the logged‑in internal user's profile with form fields, loading/error states, and update functionality. Supports copyable IDs and editing internal profile data.
frontend/src/components/InternalGateGuar: Protects internal pages by checking a session-based access gate and redirects users to an access screen if not validated.
frontend/src/components/LandingFooter.ts: Landing page footer with WhatsApp contact link, policy links, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Sticky landing page header with navigation links, language toggle, and auth buttons that react to scroll state.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Two-button language switcher for toggling between English and Indonesian.
frontend/src/components/layanan/BuatLaya: Form to create a new service, including validation, share management, and assigning an Asistenmu.
frontend/src/components/layanan/DaftarLa: Table listing services with actions for viewing details, updating shares, editing Asistenmu, and deactivating.
frontend/src/components/layanan/EditAsis: Modal to change the Asistenmu assigned to a service using selectable candidate options.
frontend/src/components/layanan/LayananD: Modal showing detailed information for a service including status, dates, and share principals.
frontend/src/components/layanan/LayananU: Modal for editing a service’s share principals with add/remove inputs and update submission.
frontend/src/components/layanan/Manajeme: Displays and filters services with search, categorization, and creation handling, rendering grouped service lists with status badges.
frontend/src/components/LockedPanel.tsx: Card component that displays a lock icon and message indicating a disabled or unavailable feature.
frontend/src/components/partner/income/P: Fetches and shows a partner's wallet balance, earnings, and pending payouts with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/partner/work/Par: Renders a compact task card with badges, deadline, and a detail button, triggering onClick when selected.
Displays detailed task info in a dialog with actions for accepting, rejecting, and requesting QA based on task state.
Lists partner tasks using PartnerTaskCard or shows an empty state message if none exist.
Organizes partner tasks into tabbed categories and opens task detail dialogs based on selection.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a reload prompt with error details.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Activ: Shows read-only client details in a dialog, including IDs, role, status, and optional profile fields.
Displays a table of active client profiles with loading/error states and a detail dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Colla: A generic card section with toggleable collapse behavior and optional mounted content.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Inter: Shows internal users pending approval with logic for approving or rejecting each entry.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Partn: Dialog that fetches and displays partner performance metrics with loading and error handling.
Dialog for updating a partner's level and auto-calculated hourly rate, with mutation and validation.
Manages partner actions—approve, reject, suspend, blacklist, reactivate—and shows status-specific tables.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Super: View for reading and updating internal access codes with form handling and mutation feedback.
Dialog component that fetches and displays detailed information about a specific internal task with status and request type badges.
Task management interface providing filters, stats, pagination, and detailed task viewing for superadmins.
Grid component rendering task statistics in individual cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Trunc: UI cell that truncates a principal ID and provides a copy-to-clipboard button with feedback.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/UserM: Main user management dashboard handling search, partner status sections, internal user approvals, and active client data.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/UserR: Collapsible table listing internal users by role with status indicators and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/UserS: Search bar allowing queries by user ID, principal ID, or name with clear and submit actions.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskListCa: Client-facing task list card showing task summaries, request type badges, and creation/deadline dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAsistenmuAssignmen: Provides stubs for fetching Asistenmu candidates and assigning them to Layananku, with React Query mutations and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useAsistenmuDelegatio: Fetches incoming tasks and task details for Asistenmu and provides mutations to assign tasks or update task status.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientServiceReque: Contains stubbed hooks for creating client service requests and fetching client tasks, with basic error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternalAccessCode: Allows superadmins to fetch and update internal access codes using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLayananku.ts: Includes stubbed hooks for creating, fetching, and updating Layananku records for various user roles.
frontend/src/hooks/usePartnerWallet.ts: Fetches placeholder partner wallet data until backend wallet support is implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/usePartnerWork.ts: Provides hooks for partners to fetch tasks and update task statuses, invalidating related caches on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements generic user, profile, registration, and superadmin-related queries and mutations using the backend actor.
Provides a React Query hook to search services and clients by mapping UI search modes to backend modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuperadminTasks.ts: Defines hooks for superadmin to fetch all internal tasks and retrieve task details by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuperadminUserMana: Includes multiple hooks for superadmin user search and fetching partners, internal users, and clients with filtering options.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Exports a hook for fetching all client tasks via the internal tasks API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports paths to static brand asset images.
frontend/src/lib/forms/registrationSchem: Defines form data interfaces and field configurations for client and partner registration forms.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Declares locale types and a comprehensive list of translation keys for English and Indonesian UI strings.
frontend/src/lib/internalRoles.ts: Defines internal role metadata, login routes, and utilities for resolving route paths from role IDs.
frontend/src/lib/partnerWorkSorting.ts: Provides task-sorting logic based on request priority and deadlines.
frontend/src/lib/partnerWorkStatusMappin: Maps task statuses and request types to UI labels, badge variants, and supports tab-based task filtering.
frontend/src/lib/superadminUserMapping.t: Contains mapping utilities between UI and backend enums for partner levels, statuses, and rate formatting.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Defines preset WhatsApp messages and utilities for generating shareable WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with sidebar-driven navigation for summary, user management, service management, tasks, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientDashboar: Client dashboard showing greeting, profile info, and multiple tabs for summary, profile, services, requests, and delegation.
frontend/src/pages/internal/AsistenmuDas: Asistenmu internal dashboard displaying profile info and a delegation management view.
frontend/src/pages/internal/CustomerServ: Customer service dashboard with sidebar navigation for summary, user/service/task management, guides, and tickets.
frontend/src/pages/internal/FinanceDashb: Finance dashboard showing profile details and placeholder finance overview content.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRole: Error page indicating role mismatch with a prompt to return to internal login.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ManagementDa: Management dashboard showing profile info and placeholder management overview content.
frontend/src/pages/internal/SupervisorDa: Renders the supervisor dashboard with profile info, localized headings, and a placeholder card behind an access gate.
frontend/src/pages/InternalGatePage.tsx: Gate page handling Internet Identity login, setting session flags, and navigating to internal login or registration routes.
frontend/src/pages/InternalLoginPage.tsx: Internal login page that validates roles, checks superadmin status, and routes authenticated users to their workspace.
Internal user registration page allowing authenticated users to submit role-based profiles and navigate to their workspace.
Static privacy policy page with basic text and a button returning to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showing hero content, service details, and navigation to signup or login.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Public login page using Internet Identity to authenticate users and route them to client or partner dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerBlocke: Displays a centered card informing a partner user that their account is blocked with support guidance.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerDashbo: Shows the partner dashboard with menu-driven sections, status-based alerts, and redirects blacklisted users to the blocked page.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration page with tabs and forms for client and partner signup, handling authentication, submission, and success navigation.
frontend/src/pages/superadmin/Superadmin: Implements the superadmin dashboard with a sidebar menu, profile card, and various management views behind access control.
frontend/src/pages/SyaratKetentuanPage.t: Static terms and conditions page with a card layout and a button to return to the homepage.
frontend/src/providers/LocaleProvider.ts: Provides app-wide locale state with persistence and a hook to access or update the current locale.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, and clearing URL or session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, color variables, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, architectural notes, issues, and feature requests related to internal user approval and status refresh.
